**Why this is right**
Placeholder rationale for OTR Practice Test 4 - Q016. Selected option A pending LLM review.

**Why the others miss**
This section will explain distractors after the generator step is wired.

> Options
- A. Roll the patient onto their right side and stabilize the patient with pillows before turning off the feeding pump.
- B. Ensure the head of the bed is elevated to a minimum of 30° during and immediately after feeding.
- D. O8COCOOOOOCCOOOCOO0O000000000 Ge™ Oo
